mailBody:
Dear Client,

I hope this message finds you well.

As part of our ongoing compliance and verification processes, we have created a checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC. Upon review, we noticed that there are some missing information items that we require to complete our records.

The following information is currently missing:

1. **Company Revenue Details** - Revenue details not available.
2. **Company Market Capitalization Details** - Market capitalization details not found.

We would appreciate it if you could provide this information at your earliest convenience to ensure our records are up to date.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Your Company]
[Your Contact Information]
